backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing UI control layout and an event log, with strict 4‑bit binary code validation and queries/mutations for layout and event retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs for binary‑code and UI‑validation updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend files involved in control panel UI, hooks, utilities, and layout logic.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark‑mode styles, fullscreen workspace rules, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app root and main module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the ControlPanelScreen in a dark‑theme provider with global notifications.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Ad: Modal for creating new controls with 4‑bit binary code validation, type‑specific config fields, and radio option management.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Co: Provider managing control layout state, backend sync, full layout validation, and CRUD operations including 4‑bit binary enforcement.
Renders various control types (button, toggle, slider, radio) with interactive behavior and emits signals unless in edit mode.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Cr: Provides a button to open the add‑control modal, handling loading, edit‑mode restrictions, and tooltips.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Dr: Enables dragging and selecting controls in edit mode, updating their position in layout state.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Fu: Toggles fullscreen mode with success/error handling and hides itself if unsupported.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Im: Allows exporting the current layout to JSON and importing a layout file with validation and error display.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/In: Provides an editor for the selected control’s properties, including ID, type, binary code, and radio options.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Mo: Switches between edit and interact modes with a single button.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Re: Displays a scrollable list of recently emitted signals with refresh support.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Sh: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Wo: Renders and manages the interactive canvas of controls, including selection and drag behavior depending on mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useControlLayout.ts: Provides a React context and hook for managing control layout state, including selection, creation, updates, deletion, and layout persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullscreen.ts: Implements a fullscreen control hook that syncs state, detects support, and exposes enter, exit, and toggle functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Creates an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePanelMode.ts: Manages global edit/interact panel mode using a shared store synchronized with localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentSignals.ts: Fetches recent backend events via React Query, polling periodically and exposing loading and refetch controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useSignalEmitter.ts: Provides a mutation to emit control interaction events to the backend and invalidate recent event queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, theme variables, control panel styles, fullscreen behavior, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/lib/binaryCode.ts: Validates 4‑bit binary codes and generates deterministic default codes from string seeds.
frontend/src/lib/controlDefaults.ts: Generates default control configuration objects based on control type.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Creates and triggers a JSON file download from provided data.
frontend/src/lib/layoutSerialization.ts: Validates layout structures, exports them to JSON, and imports them with error reporting.
frontend/src/lib/safeBrowser.ts: Provides safe wrappers for browser APIs like localStorage, hostname access, and fullscreen detection to avoid runtime errors.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Defines a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
Renders the main control panel UI with edit and interact modes, workspace layout, side panels, fullscreen support, and footer attribution.
frontend/src/types/controlPanel.ts: Defines TypeScript types for control panel elements, including control configs, radio options, and layout structure.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes project state, existing features, and pending requests focused on enforcing 4‑bit binary code constraints across the system.
